info: Displays bot info such as uptime, the currently set webhook, ping, and lists all webhooks.
send {Title} {Description} {Footer} {ima: Sends a message with embeds using set webhook. Put each paramater in quotation marks to avoid each word being in a different paramater. To skip a paramater, just use empty quotation marks for it.
raw {message}: Sends a message without the embed (the box). Put message in quotation marks.
sethook {Name of hook}: Set the webhook that will send messages.
addhook: Starts proccess to add a webhook
